snippet: “The English Prize,” an exhibition at the Yale Center for British Art, is a collection of mementos that English travelers on their Grand Tour lost when the boat was seized by French warships.
abstract: Sylviane Gold reviews exhibit The English Prize: The Capture of the Westmorland, an Episode of the Grand Tour, at Yale Center for British Art (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: “The English Prize,” an exhibition at the Yale Center for British Art, is a collection of mementos that English travelers on their Grand Tour lost when the boat was seized by French warships.

headline.seo: A Review of ‘The English Prize,’ at the Yale Center for British Art
headline.main: A Bounty of Souvenirs From a Captured Ship
headline.print_headline: A Bounty of Souvenirs From a Captured Ship
